title: Trolling For Cadavers - The Bone Orchard
description:
Trolling For Cadavers has been warming hearts (with a blow torch) since 2010. After a three to four year "hiatus", it's back with a vengeance, a continued taste for rotten flesh, and a penchant for dark humour! The debut album--"The Bone Orchard"--is, now, here to feast upon like the cultivated remains of flavorful human carrion! It features 10 original tracks of, probably, the most musically diversified ("Death Pop Punk Rot") anthems its facilitator has produced in his "20 some year career" (as an auditory enthusiast/artistic explorer/musician-like hobbyist), as well as, a "strangled then mangled" cover of Motley Crue's "Looks That Kill"--to top off the piling heap!

This seems to be just the beginning for "T4C". Be prepared for a "special" split e.p. release with S.O.S (Scumbags of Society) featuring the re-recorded and mastered version of Trolling For Cadavers' "Dead Sexxy", in the nearing months ahead! The follow-up to "The Bone Orchard" seems to be approaching like a grave robbin' corpse molester under a full moon in June, as well!

"The Bone Orchard" features the following tracks (Mp3 320 kbps):

The Bone Orchard
Worth Your Weight in Worms
Organ Donor
Praise the Blaze
Dandelions in December
Wicker Baskets
Buried Beneath the Leaves
Hatchet to the Skull
Severed Heads and Savage Grins
Bloody Stumps
Looks That Kill (Motley Crue Cover)
